name: Sanata Demo 3D
description:
Satana is a combination between Katana and Samurai,As the player is a samurai in an unknown world trying to discover what he is through exploration, adventure and search for answers

NOTE : this is not a demo for a full game and it is with only one mini map, and it's an experimental map

HELP : Give me your opinion on this mini map, and can it be a good game

REQUIREMENTS : the game can be played on any windows pc
